title: Change Set
description: Schema for communicating row level changes to and from DataSets.

xdm:changeRequest.description: structure to store control data for row-level changes

xdm:type.description: value signaling the type of change.

xdm:reason.description: optional value signaling the reason for this change (e.g. GDPR)

xdm:patchBody.description: JSON Patch document to be executed for the current record in the case of Patch type requests
